name: Sport Equity
description: We are currently working on a blockchain project in sport based on redistribution. I use my sports connection to respond to this identified need. In addition to participating in the sports economy, our approach has a social act. We are looking for a motivated person sharing the values of sport. You will have a big role in our team because you will implement and control the whole technical part of the project. We are really looking forward to meeting you !

team.name: LUIX ROUSSARIE
team.bioHtml: I am a former professional rugby player and I got my master's in business last summer. I am fascinated by new technologies especially blockchain.
